title: Adsorption Behavior of Carbon Dots on La3+ and The Multiple Effects on The Growth of Mung Bean Seedlings under La3+ Stress
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00530A, Paper
Xinanbei Liu, Xianfei Niu, Yinshuai Tian, Yue Jiang, Cheng Cheng, Ting Wang, Yiran Sun, Fang Chen, Ying Xu
The excessive usage of rare earth elements (REEs) as micro-fertilizers is harmful for agricultural production and environment. This study explored the potential application of carbon dots (CDs) to mitigate the...
